name: ecoleta-server
description: Aplicação servidor do projeto Ecoleta da Next Level Week by Rocketseat

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --ignore-watch node_modules --inspect -r tsconfig-paths/register --respawn --transpileOnly src/server.ts
scripts.migrations:test:run: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-node-dev -r tsconfig-paths/register $(npm bin)/typeorm migration:run -c test
scripts.seeds:test:run: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DATABASE_CONFIG=seeds:test ts-node-dev -r tsconfig-paths/register $(npm bin)/typeorm migration:run -c seeds:test
scripts.seeds:dev:run: cross-env DATABASE_CONFIG=seeds:dev ts-node-dev -r tsconfig-paths/register $(npm bin)/typeorm migration:run -c seeds:dev
scripts.seeds:prod:run: cross-env DATABASE_CONFIG=seeds node -r ./tsconfig-paths-bootstrap.js $(npm bin)/typeorm migration:run -c seeds

author: Thalyson Alexandre Rodrigues de Sousa <tha.motog@gmail.com>
